cancellation.translation[0].definitions[: a decision that an event that was planned will not happen
Rail passengers are fed up with cancellations and delays.
Bad weather led to the cancellation of the game.
a decision to end an agreement or arrangement that you have with someone
There is a cancellation fee of £20.
The hotel is fully booked, but we will let you know if there are any cancellations.
cancellation.translation[1].definitions[: a decision or statement that a planned activity will not happen, or that an agreement will be ended
Rail passengers are fed up with cancellations and delays.
Britain’s aircraft industry could face more job losses after the cancellation of a £2.3 billion order.
